{"type": "fors", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/pagination.py#L101", "contents": {"total_lines": 7, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "for page_number in page_numbers:"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    if page_number is None:"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "        page_link = PAGE_BREAK"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "    else:"}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "        page_link = PageLink(url=url_func(page_number), number=page_number,"}, {"line_number": 6, "line_content": "            is_active=page_number == current, is_break=False)"}, {"line_number": 7, "line_content": "    page_links.append(page_link)"}]}}

{"type": "fors", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/pagination.py#L704", "contents": {"total_lines": 7, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "for item in reversed(self.page):"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    position = self._get_position_from_instance(item, self.ordering)"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "    if position != compare:"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "        has_item_with_unique_position = True"}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "        break"}, {"line_number": 6, "line_content": "    compare = position"}, {"line_number": 7, "line_content": "    offset += 1"}]}}

{"type": "fors", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/reverse.py#L24", "contents": {"total_lines": 4, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "for param in overrides:"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    if param and param in request.GET:"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "        value = request.GET[param]"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "        url = replace_query_param(url, param, value)"}]}}

{"type": "fors", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/negotiation.py#L30", "contents": {"total_lines": 3, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "for parser in parsers:"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    if media_type_matches(parser.media_type, request.content_type):"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "        return parser"}]}}

{"type": "fors", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/negotiation.py#L53", "contents": {"total_lines": 14, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "for media_type_set in order_by_precedence(accepts):"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    for renderer in renderers:"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "        for media_type in media_type_set:"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "            if media_type_matches(renderer.media_type, media_type):"}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "                media_type_wrapper = _MediaType(media_type)"}, {"line_number": 6, "line_content": "                if _MediaType(renderer.media_type"}, {"line_number": 7, "line_content": "                    ).precedence > media_type_wrapper.precedence:"}, {"line_number": 8, "line_content": "                    full_media_type = ';'.join((renderer.media_type,) +"}, {"line_number": 9, "line_content": "                        tuple('{}={}'.format(key, value.decode("}, {"line_number": 10, "line_content": "                        HTTP_HEADER_ENCODING)) for key, value in"}, {"line_number": 11, "line_content": "                        media_type_wrapper.params.items()))"}, {"line_number": 12, "line_content": "                    return renderer, full_media_type"}, {"line_number": 13, "line_content": "                else:"}, {"line_number": 14, "line_content": "                    return renderer, media_type"}]}}

{"type": "fors", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/negotiation.py#L54", "contents": {"total_lines": 12, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "for renderer in renderers:"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    for media_type in media_type_set:"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "        if media_type_matches(renderer.media_type, media_type):"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "            media_type_wrapper = _MediaType(media_type)"}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "            if _MediaType(renderer.media_type"}, {"line_number": 6, "line_content": "                ).precedence > media_type_wrapper.precedence:"}, {"line_number": 7, "line_content": "                full_media_type = ';'.join((renderer.media_type,) + tuple("}, {"line_number": 8, "line_content": "                    '{}={}'.format(key, value.decode(HTTP_HEADER_ENCODING)) for"}, {"line_number": 9, "line_content": "                    key, value in media_type_wrapper.params.items()))"}, {"line_number": 10, "line_content": "                return renderer, full_media_type"}, {"line_number": 11, "line_content": "            else:"}, {"line_number": 12, "line_content": "                return renderer, media_type"}]}}

{"type": "fors", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/negotiation.py#L55", "contents": {"total_lines": 11, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "for media_type in media_type_set:"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    if media_type_matches(renderer.media_type, media_type):"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "        media_type_wrapper = _MediaType(media_type)"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "        if _MediaType(renderer.media_type"}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "            ).precedence > media_type_wrapper.precedence:"}, {"line_number": 6, "line_content": "            full_media_type = ';'.join((renderer.media_type,) + tuple("}, {"line_number": 7, "line_content": "                '{}={}'.format(key, value.decode(HTTP_HEADER_ENCODING)) for"}, {"line_number": 8, "line_content": "                key, value in media_type_wrapper.params.items()))"}, {"line_number": 9, "line_content": "            return renderer, full_media_type"}, {"line_number": 10, "line_content": "        else:"}, {"line_number": 11, "line_content": "            return renderer, media_type"}]}}

{"type": "fors", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/test.py#L68", "contents": {"total_lines": 5, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "for key, value in request.headers.items():"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    key = key.upper()"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "    if key in ('CONNECTION', 'CONTENT-LENGTH', 'CONTENT-TYPE'):"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "        continue"}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "    kwargs['HTTP_%s' % key.replace('-', '_')] = value"}]}}

{"type": "fors", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/fields.py#L92", "contents": {"total_lines": 15, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "for attr in attrs:"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    try:"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "        if isinstance(instance, Mapping):"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "            instance = instance[attr]"}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "        else:"}, {"line_number": 6, "line_content": "            instance = getattr(instance, attr)"}, {"line_number": 7, "line_content": "    except ObjectDoesNotExist:"}, {"line_number": 8, "line_content": "        return None"}, {"line_number": 9, "line_content": "    if is_simple_callable(instance):"}, {"line_number": 10, "line_content": "        try:"}, {"line_number": 11, "line_content": "            instance = instance()"}, {"line_number": 12, "line_content": "        except (AttributeError, KeyError) as exc:"}, {"line_number": 13, "line_content": "            raise ValueError("}, {"line_number": 14, "line_content": "                'Exception raised in callable attribute \"{}\"; original exception was: {}'"}, {"line_number": 15, "line_content": "                .format(attr, exc))"}]}}

{"type": "fors", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/fields.py#L125", "contents": {"total_lines": 4, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "for key in keys[:-1]:"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    if key not in dictionary:"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "        dictionary[key] = {}"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "    dictionary = dictionary[key]"}]}}

{"type": "fors", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/fields.py#L146", "contents": {"total_lines": 9, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "for choice in choices:"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    if not isinstance(choice, (list, tuple)):"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "        ret[choice] = choice"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "    else:"}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "        key, value = choice"}, {"line_number": 6, "line_content": "        if isinstance(value, (list, tuple)):"}, {"line_number": 7, "line_content": "            ret[key] = to_choices_dict(value)"}, {"line_number": 8, "line_content": "        else:"}, {"line_number": 9, "line_content": "            ret[key] = value"}]}}

{"type": "fors", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/fields.py#L169", "contents": {"total_lines": 6, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "for key, value in choices.items():"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    if isinstance(value, dict):"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "        for sub_key, sub_value in value.items():"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "            ret[sub_key] = sub_value"}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "    else:"}, {"line_number": 6, "line_content": "        ret[key] = value"}]}}

{"type": "fors", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/fields.py#L206", "contents": {"total_lines": 14, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "for key, value in grouped_choices.items():"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    if cutoff and count >= cutoff:"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "        break"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "    if isinstance(value, dict):"}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "        yield StartOptionGroup(label=key)"}, {"line_number": 6, "line_content": "        for sub_key, sub_value in value.items():"}, {"line_number": 7, "line_content": "            if cutoff and count >= cutoff:"}, {"line_number": 8, "line_content": "                break"}, {"line_number": 9, "line_content": "            yield Option(value=sub_key, display_text=sub_value)"}, {"line_number": 10, "line_content": "            count += 1"}, {"line_number": 11, "line_content": "        yield EndOptionGroup()"}, {"line_number": 12, "line_content": "    else:"}, {"line_number": 13, "line_content": "        yield Option(value=key, display_text=value)"}, {"line_number": 14, "line_content": "        count += 1"}]}}

{"type": "fors", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/fields.py#L364", "contents": {"total_lines": 2, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "for cls in reversed(self.__class__.__mro__):"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    messages.update(getattr(cls, 'default_error_messages', {}))"}]}}

{"type": "fors", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/fields.py#L578", "contents": {"total_lines": 17, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "for validator in self.validators:"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    if hasattr(validator, 'set_context'):"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "        warnings.warn("}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "            'Method `set_context` on validators is deprecated and will no longer be called starting with 3.13. Instead set `requires_context = True` on the class, and accept the context as an additional argument.'"}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "            , RemovedInDRF313Warning, stacklevel=2)"}, {"line_number": 6, "line_content": "        validator.set_context(self)"}, {"line_number": 7, "line_content": "    try:"}, {"line_number": 8, "line_content": "        if getattr(validator, 'requires_context', False):"}, {"line_number": 9, "line_content": "            validator(value, self)"}, {"line_number": 10, "line_content": "        else:"}, {"line_number": 11, "line_content": "            validator(value)"}, {"line_number": 12, "line_content": "    except ValidationError as exc:"}, {"line_number": 13, "line_content": "        if isinstance(exc.detail, dict):"}, {"line_number": 14, "line_content": "            raise"}, {"line_number": 15, "line_content": "        errors.extend(exc.detail)"}, {"line_number": 16, "line_content": "    except DjangoValidationError as exc:"}, {"line_number": 17, "line_content": "        errors.extend(get_error_detail(exc))"}]}}

{"type": "fors", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/fields.py#L1197", "contents": {"total_lines": 14, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "for input_format in input_formats:"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    if input_format.lower() == ISO_8601:"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "        try:"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "            parsed = parse_datetime(value)"}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "            if parsed is not None:"}, {"line_number": 6, "line_content": "                return self.enforce_timezone(parsed)"}, {"line_number": 7, "line_content": "        except (ValueError, TypeError):"}, {"line_number": 8, "line_content": "            pass"}, {"line_number": 9, "line_content": "    else:"}, {"line_number": 10, "line_content": "        try:"}, {"line_number": 11, "line_content": "            parsed = self.datetime_parser(value, input_format)"}, {"line_number": 12, "line_content": "            return self.enforce_timezone(parsed)"}, {"line_number": 13, "line_content": "        except (ValueError, TypeError):"}, {"line_number": 14, "line_content": "            pass"}]}}

{"type": "fors", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/fields.py#L1197", "contents": {"total_lines": 16, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "for input_format in input_formats:"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    if input_format.lower() == ISO_8601:"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "        try:"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "            parsed = parse_date(value)"}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "        except (ValueError, TypeError):"}, {"line_number": 6, "line_content": "            pass"}, {"line_number": 7, "line_content": "        else:"}, {"line_number": 8, "line_content": "            if parsed is not None:"}, {"line_number": 9, "line_content": "                return parsed"}, {"line_number": 10, "line_content": "    else:"}, {"line_number": 11, "line_content": "        try:"}, {"line_number": 12, "line_content": "            parsed = self.datetime_parser(value, input_format)"}, {"line_number": 13, "line_content": "        except (ValueError, TypeError):"}, {"line_number": 14, "line_content": "            pass"}, {"line_number": 15, "line_content": "        else:"}, {"line_number": 16, "line_content": "            return parsed.date()"}]}}

{"type": "fors", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/fields.py#L1197", "contents": {"total_lines": 16, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "for input_format in input_formats:"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    if input_format.lower() == ISO_8601:"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "        try:"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "            parsed = parse_time(value)"}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "        except (ValueError, TypeError):"}, {"line_number": 6, "line_content": "            pass"}, {"line_number": 7, "line_content": "        else:"}, {"line_number": 8, "line_content": "            if parsed is not None:"}, {"line_number": 9, "line_content": "                return parsed"}, {"line_number": 10, "line_content": "    else:"}, {"line_number": 11, "line_content": "        try:"}, {"line_number": 12, "line_content": "            parsed = self.datetime_parser(value, input_format)"}, {"line_number": 13, "line_content": "        except (ValueError, TypeError):"}, {"line_number": 14, "line_content": "            pass"}, {"line_number": 15, "line_content": "        else:"}, {"line_number": 16, "line_content": "            return parsed.time()"}]}}

{"type": "fors", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/fields.py#L1667", "contents": {"total_lines": 5, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "for idx, item in enumerate(data):"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    try:"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "        result.append(self.child.run_validation(item))"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "    except ValidationError as e:"}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "        errors[idx] = e.detail"}]}}

{"type": "fors", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/fields.py#L1729", "contents": {"total_lines": 6, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "for key, value in data.items():"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    key = str(key)"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "    try:"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "        result[key] = self.child.run_validation(value)"}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "    except ValidationError as e:"}, {"line_number": 6, "line_content": "        errors[key] = e.detail"}]}}

ifs: {"type": "ifs", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/setup.py#L14", "contents": {"total_lines": 20, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "if CURRENT_PYTHON < REQUIRED_PYTHON:"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    sys.stderr.write("}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "        \"\"\""}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "=========================="}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "Unsupported Python version"}, {"line_number": 6, "line_content": "=========================="}, {"line_number": 7, "line_content": "This version of Django REST Framework requires Python {}.{}, but you're trying"}, {"line_number": 8, "line_content": "to install it on Python {}.{}."}, {"line_number": 9, "line_content": "This may be because you are using a version of pip that doesn't"}, {"line_number": 10, "line_content": "understand the python_requires classifier. Make sure you"}, {"line_number": 11, "line_content": "have pip >= 9.0 and setuptools >= 24.2, then try again:"}, {"line_number": 12, "line_content": "    $ python -m pip install --upgrade pip setuptools"}, {"line_number": 13, "line_content": "    $ python -m pip install djangorestframework"}, {"line_number": 14, "line_content": "This will install the latest version of Django REST Framework which works on"}, {"line_number": 15, "line_content": "your version of Python. If you can't upgrade your pip (or Python), request"}, {"line_number": 16, "line_content": "an older version of Django REST Framework:"}, {"line_number": 17, "line_content": "    $ python -m pip install \"djangorestframework<3.10\\\""}, {"line_number": 18, "line_content": "\"\"\""}, {"line_number": 19, "line_content": "        .format(*(REQUIRED_PYTHON + CURRENT_PYTHON)))"}, {"line_number": 20, "line_content": "    sys.exit(1)"}]}}

{"type": "ifs", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/setup.py#L54", "contents": {"total_lines": 17, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "if sys.argv[-1] == 'publish':"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    if os.system('pip freeze | grep twine'):"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "        print('twine not installed.\\nUse `pip install twine`.\\nExiting.')"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "        sys.exit()"}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "    os.system('python setup.py sdist bdist_wheel')"}, {"line_number": 6, "line_content": "    if os.system('twine check dist/*'):"}, {"line_number": 7, "line_content": "        print('twine check failed. Packages might be outdated.')"}, {"line_number": 8, "line_content": "        print('Try using `pip install -U twine wheel`.\\nExiting.')"}, {"line_number": 9, "line_content": "        sys.exit()"}, {"line_number": 10, "line_content": "    os.system('twine upload dist/*')"}, {"line_number": 11, "line_content": "    print('You probably want to also tag the version now:')"}, {"line_number": 12, "line_content": "    print(\"  git tag -a %s -m 'version %s'\" % (version, version))"}, {"line_number": 13, "line_content": "    print('  git push --tags')"}, {"line_number": 14, "line_content": "    shutil.rmtree('dist')"}, {"line_number": 15, "line_content": "    shutil.rmtree('build')"}, {"line_number": 16, "line_content": "    shutil.rmtree('djangorestframework.egg-info')"}, {"line_number": 17, "line_content": "    sys.exit()"}]}}

{"type": "functions", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/relations.py#L20", "contents": {"total_lines": 7, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "def method_overridden(method_name, klass, instance):"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    \"\"\""}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "    Determine if a method has been overridden."}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "    \"\"\""}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "    method = getattr(klass, method_name)"}, {"line_number": 6, "line_content": "    default_method = getattr(method, '__func__', method)"}, {"line_number": 7, "line_content": "    return default_method is not getattr(instance, method_name).__func__"}]}}

{"type": "functions", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/relations.py#L49", "contents": {"total_lines": 4, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "def __new__(cls, url, obj):"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    ret = super().__new__(cls, url)"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "    ret.obj = obj"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "    return ret"}]}}

{"type": "functions", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/relations.py#L54", "contents": {"total_lines": 2, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "def __getnewargs__(self):"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    return str(self), self.name"}]}}

{"type": "functions", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/relations.py#L57", "contents": {"total_lines": 3, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "@property"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "def name(self):"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "    return str(self.obj)"}]}}

{"type": "functions", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/relations.py#L73", "contents": {"total_lines": 2, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "def __init__(self, pk):"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    self.pk = pk"}]}}

{"type": "functions", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/relations.py#L76", "contents": {"total_lines": 2, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "def __str__(self):"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    return '%s' % self.pk"}]}}

{"type": "functions", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/relations.py#L94", "contents": {"total_lines": 16, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "def __init__(self, **kwargs):"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    self.queryset = kwargs.pop('queryset', self.queryset)"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "    cutoff_from_settings = api_settings.HTML_SELECT_CUTOFF"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "    if cutoff_from_settings is not None:"}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "        cutoff_from_settings = int(cutoff_from_settings)"}, {"line_number": 6, "line_content": "    self.html_cutoff = kwargs.pop('html_cutoff', cutoff_from_settings)"}, {"line_number": 7, "line_content": "    self.html_cutoff_text = kwargs.pop('html_cutoff_text', self."}, {"line_number": 8, "line_content": "        html_cutoff_text or _(api_settings.HTML_SELECT_CUTOFF_TEXT))"}, {"line_number": 9, "line_content": "    if not method_overridden('get_queryset', RelatedField, self):"}, {"line_number": 10, "line_content": "        assert self.queryset is not None or kwargs.get('read_only', None"}, {"line_number": 11, "line_content": "            ), 'Relational field must provide a `queryset` argument, override `get_queryset`, or set read_only=`True`.'"}, {"line_number": 12, "line_content": "    assert not (self.queryset is not None and kwargs.get('read_only', None)"}, {"line_number": 13, "line_content": "        ), 'Relational fields should not provide a `queryset` argument, when setting read_only=`True`.'"}, {"line_number": 14, "line_content": "    kwargs.pop('many', None)"}, {"line_number": 15, "line_content": "    kwargs.pop('allow_empty', None)"}, {"line_number": 16, "line_content": "    super().__init__(**kwargs)"}]}}

{"type": "functions", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/relations.py#L119", "contents": {"total_lines": 4, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "def __new__(cls, *args, **kwargs):"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    if kwargs.pop('many', False):"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "        return cls.many_init(*args, **kwargs)"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "    return super().__new__(cls, *args, **kwargs)"}]}}

{"type": "functions", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/relations.py#L126", "contents": {"total_lines": 19, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "@classmethod"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "def many_init(cls, *args, **kwargs):"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "    \"\"\""}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "        This method handles creating a parent `ManyRelatedField` instance"}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "        when the `many=True` keyword argument is passed."}, {"line_number": 6, "line_content": "        Typically you won't need to override this method."}, {"line_number": 7, "line_content": "        Note that we're over-cautious in passing most arguments to both parent"}, {"line_number": 8, "line_content": "        and child classes in order to try to cover the general case. If you're"}, {"line_number": 9, "line_content": "        overriding this method you'll probably want something much simpler, eg:"}, {"line_number": 10, "line_content": "        @classmethod"}, {"line_number": 11, "line_content": "        def many_init(cls, *args, **kwargs):"}, {"line_number": 12, "line_content": "            kwargs['child'] = cls()"}, {"line_number": 13, "line_content": "            return CustomManyRelatedField(*args, **kwargs)"}, {"line_number": 14, "line_content": "        \"\"\""}, {"line_number": 15, "line_content": "    list_kwargs = {'child_relation': cls(*args, **kwargs)}"}, {"line_number": 16, "line_content": "    for key in kwargs:"}, {"line_number": 17, "line_content": "        if key in MANY_RELATION_KWARGS:"}, {"line_number": 18, "line_content": "            list_kwargs[key] = kwargs[key]"}, {"line_number": 19, "line_content": "    return ManyRelatedField(**list_kwargs)"}]}}

{"type": "functions", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/relations.py#L149", "contents": {"total_lines": 4, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "def run_validation(self, data=empty):"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    if data == '':"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "        data = None"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "    return super().run_validation(data)"}]}}

{"type": "functions", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/relations.py#L155", "contents": {"total_lines": 5, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "def get_queryset(self):"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    queryset = self.queryset"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "    if isinstance(queryset, (QuerySet, Manager)):"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "        queryset = queryset.all()"}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "    return queryset"}]}}

{"type": "functions", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/relations.py#L167", "contents": {"total_lines": 2, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "def use_pk_only_optimization(self):"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    return False"}]}}

{"type": "functions", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/relations.py#L170", "contents": {"total_lines": 13, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "def get_attribute(self, instance):"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    if self.use_pk_only_optimization() and self.source_attrs:"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "        try:"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "            attribute_instance = get_attribute(instance, self.source_attrs[:-1]"}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "                )"}, {"line_number": 6, "line_content": "            value = attribute_instance.serializable_value(self.source_attrs[-1]"}, {"line_number": 7, "line_content": "                )"}, {"line_number": 8, "line_content": "            if is_simple_callable(value):"}, {"line_number": 9, "line_content": "                value = value().pk"}, {"line_number": 10, "line_content": "            return PKOnlyObject(pk=value)"}, {"line_number": 11, "line_content": "        except AttributeError:"}, {"line_number": 12, "line_content": "            pass"}, {"line_number": 13, "line_content": "    return super().get_attribute(instance)"}]}}

{"type": "functions", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/relations.py#L187", "contents": {"total_lines": 8, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "def get_choices(self, cutoff=None):"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    queryset = self.get_queryset()"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "    if queryset is None:"}, {"line_number": 4, "line_content": "        return {}"}, {"line_number": 5, "line_content": "    if cutoff is not None:"}, {"line_number": 6, "line_content": "        queryset = queryset[:cutoff]"}, {"line_number": 7, "line_content": "    return OrderedDict([(self.to_representation(item), self.display_value("}, {"line_number": 8, "line_content": "        item)) for item in queryset])"}]}}

{"type": "functions", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/relations.py#L57", "contents": {"total_lines": 3, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "@property"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "def choices(self):"}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "    return self.get_choices()"}]}}

{"type": "functions", "project_source": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework", "direct_link_to_file_line": "https://github.com/encode/django-rest-framework/blob/master/rest_framework/relations.py#L213", "contents": {"total_lines": 3, "lines": [{"line_number": 1, "line_content": "def iter_options(self):"}, {"line_number": 2, "line_content": "    return iter_options(self.get_choices(cutoff=self.html_cutoff), cutoff="}, {"line_number": 3, "line_content": "        self.html_cutoff, cutoff_text=self.html_cutoff_text)"}]}}
